conviction.name: Battle Instinct
conviction.template:
Gain +%1 shielding and +%2 sword/axe/club fighting when %3 creatures are on adjacent squares.
For each additional creature (up to %4), you get +%1 shielding and +%2 sword/axe/club fighting more.

conviction.name: Battle Healing
conviction.template:
For each creature challenged, you will heal yourself for a small amount.
This amount doubles if you have less than %1% of your hit points and triples the the amount if you have less than %2% of your hit points.

conviction.name: Ballistic Mastery
conviction.template: The critical extra damage for attacks with a crossbow is increased by %1%. If you attack with a bow, your attacks and spells treat the physical and holy sensitivity as being %2% higher for all enemies you hit.

conviction.name: Positional Tactics
conviction.template: Gain +%1 distance fighting while no monster is within 1 square. Otherwise gain +%2 holy and +%3 healing magic level.

conviction.name: Augmented Swift Foot
conviction.t1: -8s secondary group cooldown, can attack and use spells but with 50% less damage
conviction.t2: -6s cooldown, damage dealt is no longer reduced

conviction.name: Augmented Sharpshooter
conviction.t1: enables casting of support spells and -8s secondary group cooldown
conviction.t2: -6s cooldown, distance skill increased from 40% to 45%

conviction.name: Focus Mastery
conviction.template: Increases the damage of your next damage spell by %1% within %2 seconds after casting a focus spell.

conviction.name: Augmented Great Fire Wave
conviction.t1: 15% critical extra damage, 10% critical chance (not cumulative)

conviction.name: Healing Link
conviction.template: If you heal someone with Nature's Embrace or Heal Friend, you also heal yourself for %1% of the applied healing.

conviction.name: Runic Mastery
conviction.template: When you use a rune, you have a %1% chance of increasing your magic level by %2% (%3% for runes created by your vocation).

revelation.name: Gift of Life
revelation.template:
If an attack were to kill you, but the overkill damage amounts to less than %1% of your maximum HP, you will heal yourself for %1% of your maximum HP first.
In addition all your spell cooldowns are reduced by %2 seconds.
Cooldown: %3 hours (only reduced while being in battle).

revelation.name: Executioner's Throw
revelation.template:
This spell throws your weapon on your target and jumps on %1 nearby enemies. Deals %2 additional damage to targets with less than %3% of their hit points.
Cooldown: %4 seconds
Mana cost: %5.

revelation.name: Combat Mastery
revelation.template:
Increases the defence value of shields by %1.
Increases your critical extra damage by %2 while wielding a two-handed weapon.

revelation.name: Avatar of Steel
revelation.template:
This spell transforms yourself into a powerful avatar for %1 seconds.
While in this form, you benefit from %2 damage reduction and all your attacks are critical hits with %3 critical extra damage.
Cooldown: %4 minutes

revelation.name: Divine Grenade
revelation.template:
This spell plants a marker at the feet of your target that explodes after 3 seconds, dealing %1 holy damage. Damage increases with higher spell stages.
Cooldown: %2 seconds
Mana cost: %3

revelation.name: Divine Empowerment
revelation.template:
This spell deploys a 3x3 field of holy energy below your feet that lasts 5 seconds. As long as you stand in this field, the damage you deal is increased by %1%.
Cooldown: %2s
Mana cost: %3

revelation.name: Avatar of Light
revelation.template:
This spell transforms yourself into a powerful avatar for %1 seconds.
While in this form, you benefit from %2 damage reduction and all your attacks are critical hits with %3 critical extra damage.
Cooldown: %4 minutes

revelation.name: Beam Mastery
revelation.template:
Unlocks a beam spell that deals death damage. Damage and length increase with higher spell stages.
Cooldown: %1 seconds
Mana cost: %2
For each target hit by a beam spell (up to 3), the cooldown of all other spells is reduced by %1s and the damage of this spell is increased by %2%.

revelation.name: Drain Body
revelation.template: This passive spell adds leeching to other crippling debuffs, with additional %1% mana leech being applied to creatures affected by Expose Weakness and %2% life leech to creatures affected by Sap Strength.

revelation.name: Avatar of Storm
revelation.template:
This spell transforms yourself into a powerful avatar for %1 seconds.
While in this form, you benefit from %2 damage reduction and all your attacks are critical hits with %3 critical extra damage.
Cooldown: %4 minutes

revelation.name: Twin Bursts
revelation.template:
Decide wisely whether you want to cast ice or earth damage in a small area around you, as these two ring spells share the same cooldown. Both spells deal %1% additional damage to targets with more than %2% of their hit points.
Cooldown: %3 seconds
Mana cost: %4

revelation.name: Blessing of the Grove
revelation.template: Your healing is increased based on the current hit points of your healing target (%1% when between 30-60% hp, %2% when below 30%).

revelation.name: Avatar of Nature
revelation.template:
This spell transforms yourself into a powerful avatar for %1 seconds.
While in this form, you benefit from %2 damage reduction and all your attacks are critical hits with %3 critical extra damage.
Cooldown: %4 minutes
